text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

Good job today.
Good for you Chiyuki.

The comedian's teasing was a bit intense, but...
I was relieved that you handled it well.

Hehe,
I've been told that I teased them back instead.
I didn't intend it that way, but...
Is it alright?

When I talk to Chiyuki, sometimes she says something that
surprises me. That's part of Chiyuki's charm, I suppose.
...Thank you.

I was happy to have a little time for promotion.
Our unit's live...

Yeah,
everyone's working hard, so I have to do my best too.

Hehe, I always feel supported by you,
Producer-san.

Chiyuki, is there something bothering you?
Feel free to talk to me about anything.

When you're feeling a bit off,
Producer-san...

Do you feel happy when someone reaches
out to you? I tend to feel that way, but...

Some people feel like they're bothering others
when they reach out... I've thought about that, and...

I see, it's a tricky issue.
It depends on what's bringing you down, I guess.

Just having someone nearby, showing they care,
can be comforting, right?

The feeling of someone's presence...
I understand. Thank you, Producer-san!
